Bandit.Name: Bandit
Bandit.Description: A human bandit is a member of a group of criminals who prey on the weak and defenseless. They are typically armed with simple weapons and armor, and they are not particularly skilled in combat.

Goblin.Name: Goblin
Goblin.Description: A goblin is a small, humanoid creature that is often associated with evil. They are typically cowardly and treacherous, but they can be fierce fighters when cornered.

Orc.Name: Orc
Orc.Description: An orc is a large, brutish humanoid creature that is often associated with violence and destruction. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are skilled in combat.

Troll.Name: Troll
Troll.Description: A troll is a large, hulking humanoid creature that is often associated with evil. They are typically strong and aggressive, and they are immune to fire and poison damage.
